section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The mission of the EIA, a non-profit European organisation, is to improve the products, practices and services used to manage water resources and to contribute to the global improvement of the environment. The EIA informs and collaborates with European Agriculture, Turf and Golf industries to promote the conservation, distribution and recovery of water resources for economical needs.
